BitParameterBlock.Name: sw_flag
BitParameterBlock.Description: This parameter controls the version of current AEC.

IntegerParameter.Name: nr_coeffs_real
IntegerParameter.Description: Number of taps in real subband. Class I parameter. Default=100

IntegerParameter.Name: nr_coeffs_complex_1
IntegerParameter.Description: Number of taps in complex subband 1. Class I parameter. Default=100

IntegerParameter.Name: nr_coeffs_complex_2
IntegerParameter.Description: Number of taps in complex subband 2. Class I parameter. Default=100

IntegerParameter.Name: nr_coeffs_complex_3
IntegerParameter.Description: Number of taps in complex subband 3. Class I parameter. Default=2

IntegerParameter.Name: nr_coeffs_complex_4
IntegerParameter.Description: Number of taps in complex subband 4. Class I parameter. Default=2

IntegerParameter.Name: nr_coeffs_complex_5
IntegerParameter.Description: Number of taps in complex subband 5. Class I parameter. Default=2

IntegerParameter.Name: nr_shl_norm
IntegerParameter.Description: Number of left shifts used in norm calculation for the NLMS algorithm Class II parameter. Default=0xFFF7

IntegerParameter.Name: x_max_exp
IntegerParameter.Description: Max. value of SB input exponents in delay lines Class II parameter. Default=0x0004

FixedPointParameter.Name: h_max_lim
FixedPointParameter.Description: Max. absolute value of real and imaginary parts of adaptive filter coefficients, used for rescale decision. Class II parameter. Min=0x1000 Max=0x7FFF Default=0x6000

FixedPointParameter.Name: x_max_lim
FixedPointParameter.Description: Max. absolute value of real and imaginary parts of delay line samples, used for rescale decision. Class II parameter. Min=0x1000 Max=0x7FFF. Default=0x7FFF

FixedPointParameter.Name: corr_thres
FixedPointParameter.Description: Threshold for high-correlation decision (between adaptive filter output and near-end input in SB. Class II parameter. Min=0x4000 Max=0x7FFF. Default=0x7C28

IntegerParameter.Name: sb_meas_shl_ri
IntegerParameter.Description: Number of left shifts in smoothing absolute values of SB signals for rising signals. Class II parameter. Default=0xFFFB

IntegerParameter.Name: sb_meas_shl_fa
IntegerParameter.Description: Number of left shifts in smoothing absolute values of SB signals for falling signals. Class II parameter. Default=0xFFF8

IntegerParameter.Name: nr_steps_shl_ri
IntegerParameter.Description: Number of left shifts in step size routine for rising signals. Class II parameter. Default=0xFFFB

IntegerParameter.Name: nr_steps_shl_fa
IntegerParameter.Description: Number of left shifts in step size routine for falling signals. Class II parameter. Default=0xFFF5

FixedPointParameter.Name: steps_sig_thresh
FixedPointParameter.Description: Far end SB signal thresholds in SR StepSize Class II parameter. Min=0x0000 Max=0x7FFF Default=0x0032

IntegerParameter.Name: nr_far_near_shl_ri
IntegerParameter.Description: Number of left shifts in far/near ratio minimum detector for rising signals. Class II parameter. Default=0xFFF2

IntegerParameter.Name: nr_far_near_shl_fa
IntegerParameter.Description: Number of left shifts in far/near ratio minimum detector for falling signals. Class II parameter. Default=0x0000

IntegerParameter.Name: factor_near_fa_calc
IntegerParameter.Description: Factor for near/far ratio calculation. Class II parameter. Default=0x0002

IntegerParameter.Name: nr_far_near_shl
IntegerParameter.Description: Factor for near/far ratio calculation. Class II parameter. Default=0xFFF8

FixedPointParameter.Name: far_near_ld_max
FixedPointParameter.Description: Max. value of measured far/near level difference. Class II parameter. Min=0x0000 Max=0x7FFF Default=0x1000

IntegerParameter.Name: x_min_exp
IntegerParameter.Description: Minimum value of the exponent that the LMS filter coefficients can have. Class II parameter. Default=0xFFFE

FixedPointParameter.Name: steps_sig_thresh1
FixedPointParameter.Description: Far end subband signal thresholds in updated StepSize for band 1 (800 Hz .. 2400 Hz). Class II parameter. Min=0 Max=32767 Default=40

FixedPointParameter.Name: steps_sig_thresh2
FixedPointParameter.Description: Far end subband signal thresholds in updated StepSize for band 2 (2400 Hz .. 4000 Hz). Class II parameter. Min=0 Max=32767 Default=25

IntegerParameter.Name: data_shift
IntegerParameter.Description: Shift of the AEC coefficients for AEC initialization, Class II parameters

IntegerParameter.Name: s_sfloor_attack
IntegerParameter.Description: Attack time for raw kstep size floor detector. Class II parameter. Default=-8

IntegerParameter.Name: s_sfloor_decay
IntegerParameter.Description: Decay time for raw step size detector. Class II parameter. Default=-4

IntegerParameter.Name: alpha_smooth_attack
IntegerParameter.Description: Attack time constant for first stage step size mode indicator. Class II parameter. Default=-2

IntegerParameter.Name: alpha_smooth_decay
IntegerParameter.Description: Attack time constant for first stage step size mode indicator. Class II parameter. Default=-2

IntegerParameter.Name: beta_smooth_attack
IntegerParameter.Description: Attack time constant for second stage step size mode indicator. Class II parameter. Default=-1

IntegerParameter.Name: beta_smooth_decay
IntegerParameter.Description: Decay time constant for second stage step size mode indicator. Class II parameter. Default=-15

FixedPointParameter.Name: st_detector_sensitivity
FixedPointParameter.Description: ST detection sensitivity. Class I parameter. Min=1 Max=32767 Default=11469

FixedPointParameter.Name: dt_detector_sensitivity
FixedPointParameter.Description: DT detection sensitivity. Class I parameter. Min=1 Max=32767 Default=26214

FixedPointParameter.Name: st_step_min
FixedPointParameter.Description: Minimum value of step size multiplier during ST talk. Class I parameter. Min=0 Max=32767 Default=11469

FixedPointParameter.Name: st_step_max
FixedPointParameter.Description: Maximum value of step size multiplier during ST talk. Class I parameter. Min=0 Max=31130 Default=31130

FixedPointParameter.Name: st_step_mult
FixedPointParameter.Description: Old step size multiplier in ST. Class I parameter. Min=4096 Max=32767 Default=28672

FixedPointParameter.Name: dt_step_mult
FixedPointParameter.Description: Old step size multiplier in DT. Class II parameter. Min=0 Max=32767 Default=16384

BitParameterBlock.Name: dt_flag_dependency
BitParameterBlock.Description: Dependency of different sub-bands to DT. Min=0 Max=127 Default=7

IntegerParameter.Name: sub_0_real
IntegerParameter.Description: Initial AEC coefficient of band 0. Class II parameter

IntegerParameter.Name: sub_1_real
IntegerParameter.Description: Initial AEC coefficient of band 1 (real part). Class II parameter

IntegerParameter.Name: sub_1_im
IntegerParameter.Description: Initial AEC coefficient of band 1 (imaginary part). Class II parameter

IntegerParameter.Name: sub_2_real
IntegerParameter.Description: Initial AEC coefficient of band 2 (real part). Class II parameter

IntegerParameter.Name: sub_2_im
IntegerParameter.Description: Initial AEC coefficient of band 2 (imaginary part). Class II parameter

IntegerParameter.Name: sub_3_real
IntegerParameter.Description: Initial AEC coefficient of band 3 (real part). Class II parameter

IntegerParameter.Name: sub_3_im
IntegerParameter.Description: Initial AEC coefficient of band 3 (imaginary part). Class II parameter

IntegerParameter.Name: sub_4_real
IntegerParameter.Description: Initial AEC coefficient of band 4 (real part). Class II parameter

IntegerParameter.Name: sub_4_im
IntegerParameter.Description: Initial AEC coefficient of band 4 (imaginary part). Class II parameter

IntegerParameter.Name: sub_5_real
IntegerParameter.Description: Initial AEC coefficient of band 5 (real part). Class II parameter

IntegerParameter.Name: sub_5_im
IntegerParameter.Description: Initial AEC coefficient of band 5 (imaginary part). Class II parameter
